title: Simple Kimchi Fried Rice
instructions: Heat the vegetable oil and sesame oil in a pan.
Add-in the chopped kimchi. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes.
Put-in the white rice. Stir-fry for 3 to 5 minutes.
Pour-in the kimchi juice. Stir. Cook for 2 minutes more.
Transfer to a serving plate. Enjoy with galbi.
Share and enjoy!

title: Fish Adobo Recipe
ingredients: ▢ 2 lbs. round scad galunggong, gutted and cleaned
instructions: Rub sea salt all over the fish including the inner cavity.
Arrange the fish in a cooking pot.
Pour-in water and soy sauce. Bring to a boil.
Put-in garlic, pepper corn, and bay leaves. Cook uncovered for 5 minutes.
Pour-in vinegar. Cover and allow to re-boil. Cook for 10 to 15 minutes in low to medium heat or until the liquid reduces.
Transfer to a serving plate.
Serve with steamed white rice. Share and enjoy!

title: Tuna Melt Sandwich
ingredients: ▢ 10 ounces Albacore Tuna in can, drained
instructions: Combine the drained tuna, onion, pickle relish, and mayonnaise in a medium bowl. Gently mix the ingredients.
Use a small teaspoon to taste the mixture. Add salt as needed. Mix well.

Arrange the cheese on top of one slice of bread. Top with 1/3 of the tuna mixture. Place another slice of cheese on top of the tuna mixture, and then top with the second bread slice. Do this step until all 3 sandwiches are assembled.
Heat a skillet. Put one tuna sandwich on the heated skillet and let one side cook for 1 to 3 minutes or until the cheese starts to melt. Flip the sandwich to toast the other side.
Remove the sandwich from the skillet. Slice in half.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

title: Delicious Whole Wheat Pancakes
instructions: Preheat pan or griddle
Sift the dry ingredients together in a bowl
Beat egg in; add brown sugar, buttermilk, and butter
Pour into bowl with dry ingredients; stir but not too much
Scoop a quarter cup batter onto the pan. Flip when bubbles starts to show-up; cook for 15 to 20 seconds
Serve

title: Strawberry Greek Yogurt Smoothie
ingredients: ▢ 1/2 cup whole milk liquid fresh milk
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a blender. Start with the ice then you can add the rest of the ingredients.
Blend until the texture of the mixture becomes smooth.
Pour the Strawberry Greek Yogurt in a glass.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

title: Pamplina Recipe (Pork and Chorizo Soup with Beans)
instructions: Combine the pork, pork and beans, onion, tomato, chorizo, and pork broth in a slow cooker. Slow cook in high mode for 5 hours. This will make the pork pata very tender and the soup more flavorful because of the flavors extracted from the ingredients.
Once the pata becomes tender. Add water and Napa cabbage. Continue to slow cook for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
Add salt and pepper to taste. Stir.
Transfer to a serving bowl. Serve.
Share and enjoy!

title: Sour Cream Noodle Bake
instructions: Cook the noodle according to package instructions. Drain. Set aside.
Melt the butter in a pan.
Add the ground beef and cook until brown.
Put-in garlic salt. Stir and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour-in tomato sauce. Let boil and simmer until the sauce reduces to half. Set aside.
Preheat oven to 350 Fahrenheit.
Combine the cooked noodles, ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, sour cream, and scallions. Gently toss to mix.
Arrange the noodle mixture at the bottom of a baking pan. Top with a layer of the cooked ground beef. Arrange the shredded sharp cheddar cheese on top.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Remove from the oven. Serve.
Share and enjoy!

title: Billy’s BBQ Chicken Recipe
ingredients: ▢ 3 pounds chicken that are cut in serving pieces
▢ 3/4 cup barbecue sauce like sweet baby ray’s
▢ Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Coat the chicken pieces with oil and rub salt and pepper all over.
Start heating-up your grill. Both charcoal and gas grills are ok to use.
Place the chicken on the hot grill. Let each side grill for 7 minutes. Baste the uncooked side of the chicken with BBQ sauce.

Turn-over the chicken. Baste the grilled side with BBQ sauce. Close the grill. Have the chicken grill for 8 to 10 minutes. Continue to turn over the chicken and grill for 5 minutes on each side until the inside temp reaches 170F (you need a meat thermometer to be on the safe side).
Serve this with grilled corn on the cob.

title: Banana Yogurt Smoothie
instructions: Put all the ingredients in a blender.
Turn the blender on and blend everything until thick and creamy.
Serve in tall glasses. Yummy!
This will give you 2 glasses of creamy banana yogurt smoothie goodness. Cheers!

title: Delicious Oven Baked Potatoes
ingredients: ▢ 4 medium baking potatoes washed and cubed
instructions: Preheat oven to 450F
Get a baking pan; line with foil. Apply cooking oil spray on the aluminum foil.
Place the potatoes in a deep bowl.
Add olive oil, garlic salt and rosemary. Toss.
Line the potatoes in the baking pan with aluminum foil.
Bake for 40 minutes. Turn the potatoes for the other side to brown.
Adjust the heat to broil. Broil for an additional 12 minutes.

title: Friday Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: ▢ 7 oz. sliced boneless chicken breast or thigh
▢ sea salt and freshly ground pepper
instructions: Prepare a soup pot with chicken stock. Turn the fire on and boil the stock.
Gently throw-in the chicken, carrots, and onion in while the stock boils. Leave it for half an hour.
Pour the milk. Add dumpling noodles and parsley.
Taste the soup and adjust by adding salt and pepper.
It is now ready to serve.

title: Quick Roast Beef Sandwich
ingredients: ▢ 7 ounces thinly sliced deli roast beef
instructions: Toast the bread.
Mix rosemary and mayonnaise in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper
Spread mayonnaise on one side of the toasted bread. Put roast beef, tomato, pickled cucumber, and chopped lettuce on top. Cover with another piece of toasted bread.
Cut the bread in half.
